successes.title: STRAFE®
successes.description: The future of video games: the fastest, bloodiest, deadliest, most adjective-abusing, action-packed first-person shooter of 1996.

Pledges.description:
• NAME LISTED IN ONLINE "THANKS ZONE"
• LIMITED-EDITION STRAFE® BRAND AOL BUDDY ICONS
Your contribution to gaming history will be carved into the internet itself—your name in the "Thanks Zone" section of our website.
Plus, use STRAFE® brand AOL buddy icons to command respect on the world's most revolutionary communication platform.

• MINI STRAFE® SOUNDTRACK
+ Everything from the above tier
Inject some STRAFE® adrenaline into your life with six curated jams from the soundtrack by ToyTree. Then crash into a state of hopeless depression after realizing you should have paid $10 more.
This is it. The moment you'll tell your grandchildren about, if your head has not yet exploded. Get a digital download of the full STRAFE® game.

• STRAFE® THE GAME
• FULL STRAFE® SOUNDTRACK
+ Everything from the above tiers
This is it. The moment you'll tell your grandchildren about, if your head has not yet exploded. Get a digital download of the full STRAFE® game and soundtrack.

• EARLY SHAREWARE ACCESS
• SPECIAL FONT FOR YOUR NAME IN THE "THANKS ZONE"
+ Everything from the above tiers
Taste death early with first access to the early parts of STRAFE®.
While you're at it, stand out from the peasants with a high-class, glitter-infused font for your name in the "Thanks Zone."

• EARLY SHAREWARE ACCESS
+ Everything from the above tiers
Taste death early with first access to the early parts of STRAFE®.

•  STRAFE® POSTER
+ Everything from the above tiers
Get the poster that will brutally murder the rest of your outdated art collection. 12x16
OPTIONAL: Ruin its perfection by adding on signatures of the STRAFE® team.
